meanings.definition: A price asked for goods or services provided
meanings.sent1: The store had a high charge for the new video game.
meanings.sent2: What is the charge for fixing my phone screen?
meanings.sent3: I couldn't believe the charge for a single cup of coffee!
meanings.sent4: The charge for the concert tickets was like a small fortune.
meanings.sent5: The charge for the hotel room was so expensive it made my jaw drop.

meanings.sent2: He followed the charge to clean his room before dinner.

meanings.sent4: The charge to lead the team was a great honor.
meanings.sent5: The charge to walk the dog was a simple task for the young boy.

meanings.sent1: The phone battery needed a charge to work again.

meanings.definition: To ask for payment of a debt
meanings.sent1: The landlord will charge the rent at the beginning of the month.
meanings.sent2: I need to charge my friend for the concert tickets.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly charged his brother for borrowing his pen.
meanings.sent4: The company will charge the clients for the services provided.
meanings.sent5: She decided to charge her sister for the borrowed dress.
